Product Information

Product Gallery

Revolutionary Fire Extinguisher : Front View
The HomeHero™ Fire Extinguisher is a home fire safety product designed to give you and your family more control over your safety and security needs. Having a fire extinguisher readily available has been statistically proven to reduce fire related fatalities. Research shows that in 94% of cases where a portable extinguisher was used, fires were successfully put out.
Fire Extinguisher: Top View
Refined through rigorous ergonomic laboratory and in-home testing, the HomeHero™ Fire Extinguisher is designed to be deployed comfortably with one hand, even under the most challenging circumstances. Its modern design and sleek construction features fashion-conscious choices of materials, colors and finishes. Its design and function were created to make HomeHero more welcome as a part of your natural home dècor, and more easily accessible for immediate use in the event of an emergency.
Combination 2-in-1 Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarm with Wireless Interconnect Alert System: Top View
The HomeHero™ 2-in-1 Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarm guards your family from major fire safety threats that can be caused by toxic fumes, smoke and carbon monoxide. Building upon the latest sensing technology, HomeHero extends the capability of home fire and smoke alarms by interconnecting all HomeHero detectors together throughout your home. When one is activated all are activated. This voice alert provides specific instructions in a calm and clear manner for what to do next in the event of an emergency.
Advanced Wireless 2-in-1 Smoke / CO Alarm Network: Side View
Fire safety experts remind us to have one smoke detector in every room of our homes and a minimum of one carbon monoxide detector on every level. Networked alarm systems are now part of the national fire safety new construction standards. HomeHero’s advanced technology utilizing its 2-in-1 Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarm has enabled it to be in the forefront of fire safety systems meeting this higher level of safety protection through its unique voice alert system.
